ISSUE.TITLE: RoxyFileman issue with Firefox (and performance enhancements)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.4 The issue with the fix is described at https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/92161/roxyfileman-and-firefox And also see the performance enhancement at https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/92161/roxyfileman-and-firefox#289011

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix issues with TimeZone Fix issues with TimeZone when run in docker container
